content: "Alexa on Pi" refers to the integration of Amazon's virtual assistant, Alexa, with a Raspberry Pi single-board computer. Raspberry Pi is a small and affordable computer that can be used for various projects and can run a wide range of software. With the help of compatible hardware and software, it is possible to install Alexa on a Raspberry Pi, enabling voice-controlled interactions and access to Alexa's features and skills. This allows users to utilize Alexa in their own DIY projects and home automation setups using the Raspberry Pi platform.
